title: Auto-scroll Student Data Sheet into view on roll number selection

requirements.summary: Auto-bring the Student Data Sheet panel into the viewport whenever a roll number is selected from Backlog Distribution or the failed-students dropdown in Subject Analysis.
acceptanceCriteria: Given the user is on the Dashboard in the Subject Analysis tab, when they click any roll number button inside Backlog Distribution, the Student Data Sheet panel is shown for that roll number (or a Student Not Found panel if no match exists).
After clicking a roll number in Backlog Distribution, the UI automatically scrolls so that the Student Data Sheet panel is within the viewport without the user needing to manually scroll.
The existing behavior of selecting a roll number from Subject Analysis (failed students dropdown) continues to work and also results in the Student Data Sheet being brought into view.

file_operations.description: Add a stable scroll target for the StudentDataSheetPanel (e.g., a wrapper element with a React ref) and trigger an automatic scrollIntoView when selectedRollNumber is set/changed (including when selectedStudent is null so the 'Student Not Found' panel is shown). Ensure the same scroll behavior occurs for selections coming from both BacklogDistributionPanel roll-number buttons and the SubjectAnalysisList failed-students Select, without altering existing selection logic beyond what is needed for bringing the panel into view.
